segments.text: Hi ! Someone has reported a fault on one of your copiers .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . I'm glad you're here . It hasn't been working properly for the last few days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just a couple of weeks ago . It's usually very reliable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's making a strange noise when we try to change paper trays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure it's nothing serious , probably just a minor fault . I'll have a look at it .
segments.speaker: S1
